page.title: 19Day in the Life of Victoria
page.content: {A Day in the Life of Victoria King, {Thornton First School, 1985. { MONDAY. On Mondays my mum wakes me up at 7.00 am. I read until 7.40, then I get up. I have my breakfast and get washed and dressed. I get my bag ready for school. I go to school, do all my work, then go home for dinner at 12 noon. I go back to school in the afternoon. After school I go to my grandma's for a drink. Then I catch the bus home. My mum meets me off the bus and I cross over the road with her. Then at 4.30 pm I go to piano lessons. After that I have my tea. I watch television and play out sometimes in the field nearby and sometimes on the lane. I have a bath, watch television again and then go to bed.
